examples:
Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there,  I have been charged for my Canva subscription but i only subscribed for the free trial, now i’ve been charged and i want my money back and to cancel my subscription. Please can you sort this out

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was charged 12.95 before my renewal period was even over. The renewal period wasn't over until the 30th of this month. I wasn't going to continue my subscription because I've gotten what I've needed out of your service. With that being said, (kindly) will you please refund my money back to the way I was *going* to pay if I were to continue and cancel the service. Thank you for your beautiful templates and ideas. I would recommend to someone else.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I do not want or need Canva. I would like my money back for the year subscription I will not use. I’ve already submitted a request once and haven’t heard back. I would appreciate it if you could refund me ASAP

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've been trying to cancel my subscription 
Because I'm not using it right now, so I'm just throwing money away basically, whenever I'm ready I'll return, thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my subscription to Canva before the debiting date. The funds still came out of my account. I'm unable to use Canva Pro despite the money being taken, I should have been able to use it for another month as I've paid for it. Instead I would like a refund.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi! 

I've cancelled my Canva Pro subscription but unfortunately was not able to do so before the billing date (on Saturday) as I was outside of phone reception. I am hoping you will be kind enough to give me a refund for this month's charge of $17.99 .

Thank-you for your time, Have a lovely day,
Georgia

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've only had it for 5 days and want a refund. I just cancelled it but is there any way I can get money back instead of still being charged the full $119.40? I won't be using this account/pro account for the rest of the year (it expires exactly a year and I've only been using it for 5 days now)

Refund request reason: Hi there, the subscription auto renewed but I won't be using Canva for this month. Could I request a refund? I've cancelled my subscription as well. Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I only subscribe to test out the new canva pro but forgot to cancel my subscription and only a charge to my credit card yesterday. I've not used Canva since December when i tried it. There was also no reminder for me to cancel my subscription which I thought would happen. I've cancelled my subscription already and hope i could get a refund pls. 
Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My little sister (age 10) was using my free trial account. She had told me she cancelled the trial - but seems like she accidentally kept the account open. So sorry, this was also a misstep on my part because I’ve been so busy with life events. I have no use for this subscription.

I’ve been having some financial difficulties lately, so if it’s possible to get a refund, that would really help. Thanks!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I haven't been using Canva at all and my subscription automatically renewed on the 24th. Can I please get a refund? I've cancelled my subscription and because of COVID, money for me is really tight. Please help. Thank you.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to quit this after before the trial ended as it wasn't quite what I was looking for but it didn't recognise my account details so I couldn't get in. I've just got back into the account and have been charged even though I haven't used it since the day I started the trial. Please can you cancel my subscription and refund the month (whole time) I haven't used it?
Thanks

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: hi there - I signed up for a trial but thought I had cancelled this. I've now seen a payment was taken so have cancelled again - can you please confirm the cancellation has gone through and please issue a refund for the amount.  You'll see that the account has not been used in January.

thank you so much,
<NAME>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello! I was really certain that I had cancelled my subscription but was still charged – it might've been an internet issue where it the cancellation didn't quite go through? Please could I have a refund as I haven't used your services this month? Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my subscription in December now you've taken £107 from my account .I'd like it to be refunded today

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I need a refund for all the payments I've made. I cancelled my subscription before I was ever supposed to be charged and I have been automatically charged anyway. I'm not sure what happened since I distinctly remember cancelling my subscription before I would have to pay. I joined the account of my company so I did not mean to sign up for my own personal account.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I’ve cancelled my subscription but I’m being charged for usage until the 24th February. Please can you cancel my subscription now and refund the most recent charge. Thank you.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I trust you're fine. I cancelled the subscription before the end of the trial but I've been charged anyway. I'd like to be refunded. Many thanks for your time and kindness.

Best Regards

<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, would it be possible to get a refund for the automatic renewal fee that I've got charged today please? I've just cancelled my subscription as I don't really use it and haven't used for days. Thanks, <NAME>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, 
I was sure I had cancelled my trial but I've still been charged. I haven't used the services at all since the payment has come out of my account. Can I please get a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, We do not want to proceed with the subscription. Can you please refund us? We've determined we cannot use the service at this time. thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm pretty sure I've cancelled way before the trial have ended... Not sure why I also got charged for that. Please Refund ASAP. Thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi - I've decided to take a break from Canva Pro and just cancelled my subscription. Is it possible to get a refund on my most recent payment, which was charged today?

Best,
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: You've taken this payment after I cancelled my subscription with you in December last year

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Last few months I’ve been needing to cancel the subscription but I can never find the option on your site. Can you please cancel it and refund me? Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I had canceled this subscription, but I guess I didn’t. I’ve been unemployed due to covid and cannot pay for this. I canceled my unused subscription as soon as I was notified that I was billed, and I would like a refund. Thank you!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi!! I’m very sorry to inconvenience you this way, but I thought i had cancelled my canva Pro plan a few days ago!  I’ve been struggling with my internet connection so upon seeing this charge the cancellation must’ve not come through. 
I’m really sorry but I cannot afford an expense like this at this moment, so If you could please cancel this and issue a refund I’d be eternally grateful. Thank you for understanding.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my subscription after the first time i was billed and I just noticed i've been billed for months after that. Please refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I've got charged from July to this Jan with out my notice and My account was never active I never approved this subscription. I've never enrolled with pro-membership. I don't why it getting charged my account. 

Please can you do the need full on this charges.. and process refund oof this amounts.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I had cancelled my trial and I’ve been charged for 2 months. I haven’t even been in the system since November. Please issue a refund.

Fatura no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I haven't subscribed for Canva Por however few days ago I 've received a bill on it.  I've tried free trial months ago, so it couldn't be taht I forgot the cancel my subscription. I would like to receive. refund and cancellation of my subscription. Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I logged into my account and cancelled my subscription before the due date, and I had confirmation of the cancellation, but I’ve been charged anyway.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I had  renewed my account last month but had done it on a one off payment and didn’t think it would be a subscription. I’ve now cancelled it and would like a refund for the charge. I have not used the account and its features And won’t be needing it.  Thank you!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Apologies, I did not remember to cancel my subscription. As you can see I've rarely used Canva lately. Please can I get a refund? Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am available by phone at (314) <NUMBER>if that's easier. I'd love to get this issue resolved. I've been trying to get this refunded for months now. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot the trial date to cancel I’m barely on here and I know y’all seen that I barely used the trial!! And I’ve been sick with covid can you please refund my account

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have never or will not use this service. I have myotonic muscular dystrophy, & am not even sure how I got signed up for it,  I've paid for a year & you can see I never used it. Can you please refund me. I get 1000. a month to pay rent, car, elec. phone, etc & I am sinking fast + my muscles that pump blood to my heart are deteriorating, so I can't use it. I found it cause my card is maxed & they sent me a notice for this coming thru.  They paid it, but I wondered what it was & googled & saw I've been  paying a year.  Help please.  it would only let me pick one but i hope you can do them all
thank you
Kathy Malone

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've never used services, tried once didn't like it & being charged monthly several months after thinking I had cancelled initially. Please refund all my charges.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t realise that it automatically charged me and I thought that I had cancelled it prior to this day. It’s only been a few hours since I’ve been charged so I would like to request a refund since I’ve realised asap. Thanks!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I’ve canceled my subscription numerous times yet you still take money from my account.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've been reaching out to Canva support for weeks now and no one has answered. I requested a trial of the special that was going on and instead my card was charged. I don't have a job due to the pandemic and I've been waiting on the refund. The money was taken from my nonexistent savings. Can someone please issue the refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: If possible may I receive a refund for every time I’ve been charged, I never signed up for this subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I’ve tried to contact you but to no avail.  I don’t want to sign up for a year and I’m not even sure what I signed up for or actually putting in a credit card #.  Please cancel !  Please e all
Me .  I can’t afford it.  Help!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've been unable to use Canva for the last 27 days and will continue this way for quite some time. I realize it's my responsibility to cancel my subscriptions. Our son has been in need of visits to a children's hosptial 300 miles away from home due to a disease diagnosis. We've been very tight for cash, especially because of the negative impact COVID has had on my low-income family.  I humbly ask that you apply a full refund given the circumstances.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've cancelled Canva and would like a refund on the unused portion of my subscription. How do I receive a refund?

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I'm so sorry, I didn't want this to auto renew. I thought I had cancelled it, which I've just done now. Would it be possible to have the access revoked and the payment refunded?

หมายเลขใบแจ้งหนี้: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've used free trail for 1 month and I didn't have attention  to continue  using it in the. pro version but after the free trial ended I didn't check my e-mail or notifications. I've just found out today that I was charged for 119$

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm confident that I opt out of the Pro plan but see I've been placed back and billed again.
I do not want pro at the moment. Please refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've attempted for several months to cancel my subscription with no success. It is so very difficult! So many hoops to jump through. I am requesting a refund for February and for you to CANCEL MY SUBSCRIPTION! PLEASE AND THANK YOU!
AISHA AMENRA

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi! 
I intended to cancel this subscription, but was charged for it and I've barely used it. I was wondering if you'd be able to cancel and refund the charge back to me as the $12.95 would make a huge difference for me seeing as we have fallen on tough times because of COVID-19. I would really appreciate it! Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Greetings,
I am asking for a refund of the charges for the previous subscription. I canceled my subscription minutes after I was charged. I realized this once I logged in to cancel. Over the passed few weeks, leading up to the day I was charged, I've been impacted by work and recently received word that someone close to me had Covid complications, so my concentration has been slightly jaded. I enjoy using Canva but I do not need the subscription to achieve my goals. I would greatly appreciate it if I could receive a refund for this charge.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi Team, 
I am using the trial of Canva Pro and I dont want to subscribe to CanvaPro but the amount has been deducted automatically from my debit card. I've cancelled the subscription today itself.
Please provide the refund for the same
Thanks and regards,
Faisal Naved

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: It’s been 20 days after I’ve requested the refund but I still haven’t got it. Would you please check it out for me?

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi Canva, I received the above charge today mistakenly. I cancelled my subscription about 4-5 days ago not wanting to proceed with my yearly subscription. However, I will be honest, at the time of cancelling my subscription the website did not load and assumed that my subscription did cancel (I guess it did not). I should've checked after to see if it cancelled. Is there any chance I could have this refunded and my subscription canceller please?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi! 
I intended to cancel this subscription, but got charged for it, although I have barely used it. I was wondering if you could please cancel and refund this charge back to me as the $12.95 would make a huge difference for me seeing as we've fallen on tough times due to COVID-19. I would really appreciate it! Thank you so much.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, I would like to request a refund on this invoice. I thought I had already cancelled this and now I see that I've been charged this amount. Refund request reason: Hello, I am still waiting for my refunds for this account. Please can this be authorised? I've sent a message already explaining. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

I can trace back to last year, 6 months ago. I am therefore asking for a refund please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I noticed I my account was automatically renewed.  I've been on a recovery treatment plan since last March. I appreciate you accepting to refund my account due to mental health circumstances.  With much kindness, CD from Calgary Canada
